attributes.action: Not allow extra increases in Council Tax on homes with double glazing, when home owners have taken government advice and paid for insulation and double glazing to help the environment.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Any extra increase in Council Tax on properties with double glazing and other eco-friendly improvements, would be a disincentive from any government with a green agenda, and seems perverse. Any necessary Council Tax increases should penalise those who have not taken such steps.
